    Carla Rocha, PhD

    Software Engineering Professor & Researcher at the University of Brasília (UnB). Interests: Diversity, agile development, DevOps adoption, MLOps, Open Source community, Project-Oriented teaching

    • University of Brasília, Brazil

    Research Interests

    Aqui estão alguns temas que tenho interesse em fazer pesquisa/colaborar. O meu interesse atual é que esses trabalhos gerem artigos para serem publicados em venues de impacto para a comunidade de Engenharia de Software.

    1. Mentorship Programs for Underrepresented groups
      Questions: What are the challenges to engage underrepresented groups in mentoring programs?
      Skills: script programming, proactive

    2. Understanding Students Behavior in Open-Source Communities
      Questions: What kind of contributors are made by students? Are they working for some classroom projects? summer job? hackathons?
      Skills: script programming, proactive

    3. Teaching DevOps
      Questions: Theory on DevOps team structures/education
      Skills: script programming, proactive

    4. DevOps Migration multicloud
      Questions: What are the challenges and architectures requirement to enable multicloud solutions
      Skills: script programming, pyhton, proactive

    5. Machine learning tools for analysing data from a context
      Questions: Development of tools to facilitate data scientist is exploring data in a specific context (ex: database, github repositories, stack overflow, among others)
      Skills: script programming, python, proactive

    6. Data Engineering pipelinet
      Questions: Development of pipeline to process several databases in parallel using dataflow to facilitate data scientist is exploring data in a specific context (ex: database, github repositories, stack overflow, among others)
      Skills: script programming, python, proactive

    7. MLOps
      Questions: What are the barries to adopt MLOps practices and automation?
      Skills: script programming, proactive
